summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2882, for the improvement of Mary Street, West Dakota Street and Yancy Street, each from 28th Avenue Southwest to 30th Avenue Southwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same; providing for the necessary surface drainage; by constructing temporary wooden walks where necessary; by planking and replanking; by the readjustment of existing water mains where necessary; under Ordinance No. 35058 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
